name: "Corpse Flower" Pin 1
description:
Corpse flower fakes a death to stay alive. What would you do to survive and thrive? Inspired by the fascinating and contrasting nature of the Amorphophallus titanum, or nicknamed corpse flower, this copper pin is hand-pierced and riveted into its silhouette. It is also forged to add volume and hammered to add texture. To enhance contrast, heat patina is applied on selected part of the pin. This pin measures about 2" x 3".
*The last image of this item is to show other styles available in the collection. ***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Window to the Soul" Copper Necklace (Right)
description:
An exciting twist to the copper "gem" series! A paisley pattern is etched onto a piece of copper sheet and selectively punched into a small circle, then it is shaped into a dome as my focal point of the piece--- the metal gem! I then hand-pierce a piece of brass into the shape of an eye, and solder a fitted fine silver bezel on. After a few decorative dots are hammered along the eyelid, the gem is set into the bezel as the iris. The pendant measures about 1 1/2 x 3/4 inches and it comes with an 18" copper chain with an antique finishing. Check out the behind the scene for another style in the series!


Visit my blog!!!
*The last image is to show another style available in the same series* ***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Fly me to the moon" sterling pin with garnet & plum flocking
description:
Roller-printed, selectively reticulated and hammer-textured, a surface resembling the beautiful moon is created on a piece of sterling silver sheet. A carved garnet is then set into a fine silver bezel off center on the top. Hollow form is built next and finally a fine fiber material- flocking- is applied around the edge as a matching color frame. The pin measures about 1 5/8" x 1 5/8" x 3/16" Check out the behind the scene of a pendant in the same series!
http://chloeching.net/2012/02/15/fly-me-to-the-moon/ Apparently I don't only doodle with my torch, I also hum a tune or two with it. Now are you ready to play among the stars? *Flocking material is extremely delicate and may sightly come off due to excessive handling overtime. *The last 2 images of this item are to show other styles available in the collection. ***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Tiny Teeny Origami" Brass & Sterling Ring (Green+ White+ Gold)
description:
Three pieces of brass sheets are fabricated into a cup, a simple sterling silver band is soldered on as the band. After polishing and a light patina finish is applied onto the brass, a tiny piece of origami paper is punched out and carefully placed inside. At last, resin is poured in and the paper is sealed for good. 

This is a size 5 ring. The brass part on top measures about 9/16 inches in diameter.

*The last 2 images show some other styles in the same series.


***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Tiny Teeny Origami" Brass, Copper & Gold-filled Dangling Earrings (Navy+ Bronze+ White)
description:
Texture, colors, and patterns. I cannot have enough of them. A new spin of my "Tiny Teeny Origami" series. Now comes in dangling earrings.

To achieve the heavy texture look, first the copper discs are drawn through a roller mill with a piece of coarse grit sandpaper, then, a  brass washer is soldered on. After cleaning and polishing,
the earrings are dipped into a dark patina solution. Selectively buffed off, a high contrast gold-colored ring is created on the very top. Sealed with enamel spray, a tiny piece of origami paper is punched out and carefully placed inside the hole. At last, resin is poured in and the paper is sealed for good. 

Each earring measures about 3/4 x 11/16 inches, and comes with a simple but substantial gold-filled lever-back ear wire.


*The last image shows some other styles in the same series.


***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available

name: "Harmony" Copper Triangular Necklace with Ceramic Beads
description:
A small piece of copper is fed through the roller mill with a piece of coarse sandpaper for a rock-liked texture, then trimmed into an irregular triangle shape. All corners are filed round. My little name is punched onto a copper disc, after annealing and forming into a dome, it is then soldered onto the top. After cleaning, a dark patina solution is applied for a rich, earthy tone. Finally, it is coated with an enamel spray and seven ceramic beads are added on asymmetrically for a shot of color and a shot of fun. The pendant measures about 1" x 1 5/8" and it comes with a 16" antique-finished copper chain on top, an extra 4" dangling down on the left and 2 1/2" on the right.
**The last image is to show other similar styles available.
***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Tiny Teeny Origami" Brass & Copper Octopus Pendant (purple+gold)
description:
A piece of thick-gauged copper disc is hammered with square texture, then annealed and domed into a great volume. A brass washer is then, also annealed and domed, and soldered onto the copper piece. After polishing, a dark patina is applied and it is now antique brown tone. Sanding of the very tip of the brass washer, a bright gold rim is created for a dramatic contrast. Finally, covered with an enamel spray, a tiny piece of origami is selectively punched out and placed onto the brass bowl. At last, resin is poured into the middle and the paper is permanently sealed.

The pendant measures about 3/4" in diameter, and it comes with an 20" copper chain with an antique finish.

*The last 2 pictures are to show other style available.


***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Window to the Soul" Copper Necklace 2 (Right)
description:
An exciting twist to the copper "gem" series! A copper disc is hammer-textured with lines resembling those around the iris of an eye, then it is shaped into a dome as my focal point of the piece--- the metal gem! I then hand-pierce a piece of brass into the shape of an eye, and hammer a few decorative dots along the eyelid and lashes. Next, the "gem" is soldered onto the center. A fine silver ring is fused around the edge of the "gem" to outline the iris. Finally, the pendant is darkened with a patina solution, and selected parts are buffed to a slight shine to bring out contrast. The pendant measures about 1 1/2 x 5/8 inches and it comes with an 18" copper chain with an antique finishing. Check out the behind the scene for another style in the series!


Visit my blog!!!
*The last image is to show another style available in the same series* ***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Tiny Teeny Origami" Brass & Copper Octopus Pendant (yellow+gold)
description:
A piece of thick-gauged copper disc is hammered with square texture, then annealed and domed into a great volume. A brass washer is then, also annealed and domed, and soldered onto the copper piece. After polishing, a dark patina is applied and it is now antique brown tone. Sanding of the very tip of the brass washer, a bright gold rim is created for a dramatic contrast. Finally, covered with an enamel spray, a tiny piece of origami is selectively punched out and placed onto the brass bowl. At last, resin is poured into the middle and the paper is permanently sealed.

The pendant measures about 3/4" in diameter, and it comes with an 20" copper chain with an antique finish.

*The last 2 pictures are to show other style available.


***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Clown Collar" Copper Necklace (squares/ rock/ spiral) 1
description:
Now other than doodling with torches and saw blades, have I mentioned the awesome roller-printer? To "draw" on the raw copper sheet, different materials are used. This time I use coarse grit sand paper for a rock-liked texture, thin steel wire for the spiral lines. Secured onto the annealed (softened) copper sheet with tape and fed through the roller mill, they are then selectively trimmed down into rectangles. Other than the two roller-printed sheets, I also mix-and-matched it up with a third sheet with a sprinkled squares pattern using a special hammer. Next, half jump rings are soldered onto these rectangles as bails. Polished, applied with patina and then sealed with enamel spray, so you stay clean wearing it. Each rectangle measure from about 1 5/8" to 2 long, and it comes with an 16" brass chain with an antique finish.
**The last image is to show other similar styles available.
***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Rollertron" Copper Necklace
description:
Now other than doodling with torches and saw blades, have I mentioned the awesome roller-printer? To "draw" on the raw copper sheet, different materials are used. This time I have thin steel wire for the wavy lines and metal mesh for the crisscross pattern. Secured onto the annealed (softened) copper sheet with tape and fed through the roller mill, they are then selectively trimmed down into triangles. These triangles are then drilled and connected with jump rings. Soldered so you can dance with it; polished, applied with patina and then sealed with enamel spray so you stay clean wearing it. The triangles from left to right measure about 1 3/8 x 1/2, 1 3/8 x 13/16, and 1 3/4 x 5/8, and it comes with an 16" brass chain with an antique finish.
**The last image is to show other styles available in the same series.
***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Copper Gem" Sprinkles Necklace
description:
To "draw" on the raw copper sheet, very thin steel wire is cut and sprinkled randomly. Secured onto the annealed (softened) copper sheet with tape and fed through the roller mill, they are then selectively punched out in circles. These circles are then re-annealed and dapped (forged and shaped) into domes, and I got myself a handful of gorgeous copper "gems"! After polishing, a patina solution is brushed onto the "gem" to bring out contrast. The pendant measures about 1/2" x 1/2", and it comes with an 16" brass chain with an antique finish.
This is a limited edition of 4. Sprinkles pattern might varies slightly because it's handmade one-of-a-kind!
***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Copper Gem" Etched Paisley Cufflinks
description:
I promised a few to start making men's jewelry. Here's a baby step start!

A classic paisley pattern is etched on a piece of copper, and is then selectively punched out in circles. These circles are then re-annealed and dapped (forged and shaped) into domes, and they become what I called metal "gems"!

Next, these "gems" are set into a fine silver bezel cup like how stones can be set. After polishing, patina and enamel spray-sealing, the "gems" are secured onto silver-plated cufflinks with epoxy resin.

Each of the cufflinks measures about 3/4" in diameter.
Etched patterns might be slightly different.



***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Fly me to the moon" sterling pendant with indigo blue flocking
description:
Roller-printed, selectively reticulated and hammer-textured, a surface resembling the beautiful moon is created on a piece of sterling silver sheet. Hand-pierced and slightly forged to a dome, a smiling profile is then "drawn" on with more piercing. After setting that into a fine silver bezel, half of the dome is taken away to add negative space and also a platform for the next step: a fine fiber material- flocking- is applied onto the inner area for a shot of contrasting color and texture. Finally, a twisted wire ring bail is soldered in the back. This pendant comes with a sterling silver bead bail with elegant wirework design and a sterling silver chain. The pendant measures about 1 3/8" x 1 3/8", and the chain is 24". Check out the behind the scene for another pendant in the same series!
http://chloeching.net/2012/02/15/fly-me-to-the-moon/ Apparently I don't only doodle with my torch, I also hum a tune or two with it. Now are you ready to play among the stars? *Flocking material is extremely delicate and may sightly come off due to excessive handling overtime. *The last 2 images of this item are to show other styles available in the collection. ***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Fly me to the moon" sterling and copper pendant with garnet
description:
Roller-printed, selectively reticulated and hammer-textured, a surface resembling the beautiful moon is created on a piece of sterling silver sheet. It is then hand-pierced and slightly forged to a dome. A carved garnet is set into the smaller bezel and then the silver dome into the bigger bezel. A twisted wire ring bail is soldered in the back and a heat patina is brushed onto the outside bezel to enhance contrast. It comes with a sterling silver bead bail with elegant wirework design and a sterling silver chain. The pendant measures about 1 1/4" x 1 1/4", and the chain is 18". Check out the behind the scene!
http://chloeching.net/2012/02/15/fly-me-to-the-moon/ Apparently I don't only doodle with my torch, I also hum a tune or two with it. Now are you ready to play among the stars? *The last 2 images of this item are to show other styles available in the collection. ***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Fire Painting" Reticulated silver necklace
description:
By bringing a sterling silver disc to a temperature higher than annealing point but right below melting point, an organic wrinkly texture is created. With its simple and classic high polish finish on a perfectly weighted double-ring sterling silver chain, this neck piece will shine up your outfit just right. The pendant measures about 7/8" x 7/8", and the chain is 18".
*The last image of this item is to show other styles available in the collection. ***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Tiny Teeny Origami" Sterling Pendant (green+ blue+ gold)
description:
The Copper Tiny Teeny Origami have been getting lots of love in town!! And to thank you all, a new sterling line is introduced!

A sterling silver disc is annealed and dapped into a little bowl. Simple jump rings are soldered on as a bail. After cleaning and polishing, a tiny piece of Japanese origami paper is punched out and placed inside the bowl. Finally, resin is added to seal the paper and add a shot of glossiness to bring out the fun pattern and colors!

The pendant measures about 7/16" inches in diameter and it comes with an 16" sterling silver cable chain.




*The last 3 images are to show other styles in the same series.* 


***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Fire Painting" Reticulated Silver Ring- Single Circle (size 8.5)
description:
By bringing a sterling silver disc to a temperature higher than annealing point but right below melting point, an organic wrinkly texture is created. A loose fine silver coil is then fused on top like an abstract line drawing. Finally, a simple sterling band with a twisted pattern design is soldered on and the ring is formed!

To bring out the detail of its texture, patina is brushed on in a low heat and then carefully buffed out in selected areas.

The ring (frontal) measures about 5/8 inches in diameter. The band size is 8.5, if you would like to order one with a different ring size, please feel free to message me :)



***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

description:

The ring (frontal) measures about 11/16 inches in diameter. The band size is 10, if you would like to order one with a different ring size, please feel free to message me :)

name: "Fire Painting" Reticulated Silver Ring- Single Circle (size 5)
description:
By bringing a sterling silver disc to a temperature higher than annealing point but right below melting point, an organic wrinkly texture is created. A loose fine silver coil and a delicate sterling mesh are then fused on top like an abstract line drawing. Finally, a simple sterling band with a twisted pattern design is soldered on and the ring is formed!

To bring out the detail of its texture, patina is brushed on in a low heat and then carefully buffed out in selected areas.

The ring (frontal) measures about 11/16 inches in diameter. The band size is 5, if you would like to order one with a different ring size, please feel free to message me :)



***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Rollertron" Sterling Earrings (patina finish)
description:
Who doesn't love some dainty pretty blinks on the ears? 

These sweet studs earrings are made out of sterling silver. Annealed (softened) and roller-printed, just the right amount of texture is created. The corners are filed down into rounded squares, and are slightly dabbed into a bowl shape for some volume. Sterling silver posts are soldered on after, and the earrings are then polished to a high shine finish.

Each earring measures about 5/16 x 5/16 inch. 

*The last image is to show other styles available.* 




***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Fire Painting" Reticulated Silver Earrings #2 (size S)
description:
By bringing slightly dabbed sterling silver discs to a temperature higher than annealing point but right below melting point, an organic wrinkly texture is created. A loose fine silver coil is then fused on top each disc to add a fun accent. Finally, sterling posts are soldered onto the back and the dainty pretty earrings are formed!

To bring out the detail of its texture, patina is brushed on in a low heat and then carefully buffed out in selected areas.

Each earring measures about 1/4 inch in diameter. 

*The last 2 images are to show other styles available.* 





***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

name: "Rollertron" copper & sterling silver pendant
description:
This copper pendant is roller-printed with hand-shaped brass wire for its playful pattern. Hand-pierced for the irregular shape and slightly domed for more volume, sterling silver tubes are then soldered on top as an accent. At last, an earthy tone is added by patina oxidation and wire-brushed finish.  It comes with a simple sterling silver bail and a sterling silver chain.

The pendant measures about 1 1/8" x 7/8", and the chain is 18".

name: "Corpse Flower" Pin 3
description:
Corpse flower fakes a death to stay alive. What would you do to survive and thrive? Inspired by the fascinating and contrasting nature of the Amorphophallus titanum, or nicknamed corpse flower, this copper pin is hand-pierced into its silhouette and forged to add volume. To add a playful twist, fine silver is fused on the surface and thick layers of blues and greens prisma color are applied along the edge. This pin measures about 1 7/8" x 2 1/2".

name: "Corpse Flower" Pin 2
description:
Corpse flower fakes a death to stay alive. What would you do to survive and thrive? Inspired by the fascinating and contrasting nature of the Amorphophallus titanum, or nicknamed corpse flower, this copper pin is hand-pierced into its silhouette, with decorative pattern etched on the surface. It is also forged to add volume and wire-brushed to add texture. To enhance contrast, heat patina is applied and selectively buffed off. This pin measures about 2" x 1 3/8".

name: "Prismetal" Copper Pin 1
description:
This copper pin is roller-printed with coarse grit sandpaper, copper mesh and hand-shaped brass wire for its rich texture and fun pattern. Different sizes of small holes are then drilled on as a decorative element. After that, a domed sterling silver disc is soldered onto one of the holes for an extra accent, and a sterling silver pin is soldered onto the back. Layers and layers of prisma color are slowly applied, then finally sealed with enamel coating. The pin measures about 1 3/4" x 1 5/8". It comes with a brass nickel-finish tie tac clutch with a reinforced spring. (Please pull the very tip of the clutch to release and make sure to hear the click when you secure the pin onto your garment.) Check out the behind the scene!

Visit my blog!!!
*The last image of this item is to show another style in this collection. ***Local orders are shipped by certified priority mail with a tracking number. For international shipment, please contact me for an estimate of different methods available.

Each earring measures about 1/4" inches in diameter.
